Package no.uio.ifi.crypt4gh.pojo

Interface Crypt4GHEntity

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChaCha20IETFPoly1305EncryptionParameters, ChaCha20IETFPoly1305Segment, DataEditList, DataEncryptionParameters, EncryptableHeaderPacket, Header, HeaderPacket, Segment, X25519ChaCha20IETFPoly1305HeaderPacket
public interface Crypt4GHEntity extends Serializable
Crypt4GH entity, mostly to extend Serializable interface, but also to provide LittleEndian conversion methods.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description

    getInt(byte[] bytes)
    Utility method to get little endian integer from byte array.

    Serializes the entity to a byte array.

  • Method Details

    • serialize

      byte[] serialize() throws IOException, GeneralSecurityException
      Serializes the entity to a byte array.
      Returns:
      Serialized entity.
      Throws:
      IOException - In case the serialization fails.
      GeneralSecurityException - In case the encryption fails.
